title: Sub-agents: Session Tracking
description:
Track which agents work on which tasks.

## Use Case
- User wants to know which agents worked on a task
- Show current active agents on task
- Agent handoff history
- Time tracking per agent

## Schema

### Agent Session
```typescript
interface AgentSession {
  id: string;
  taskId: string;
  agentId: string;
  agentName: string;
  sessionId: string; // OpenClaw session ID
  startedAt: string;
  endedAt?: string;
  status: 'active' | 'idle' | 'completed' | 'failed';
  workSummary?: string;
}
```

### Task Extension
```typescript
interface TaskWithSessions extends Task {
  sessions: AgentSession[];
  activeSessions: AgentSession[];
  lastActiveAgent?: string;
}
```

## Implementation

### 1. KV Storage
- Store sessions in task.sessions array
- Limit to last 20 sessions per task
- Track current active sessions separately

### 2. API Endpoints
- POST /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/sessions - Agent claims task
- PATCH /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/sessions/[sessionId] - Update session
- GET /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/sessions - Get session history

### 3. OpenClaw Integration
- Agent calls /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/sessions on startWork()
- Agent updates session.status on progress
- Agent calls /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/sessions/[sessionId] on endWork()

### 4. UI Display
- TaskModal Sub-agents tab shows session history
- Active sessions highlighted
- Show duration per session
- Quick link to agent session logs

## Success Criteria
- Agent work history visible per task
- Active agents shown in TaskModal
- Session times tracked accurately
- Performance: <100ms to load session list

title: Activity: KV Storage Schema
description:
Design and implement activity logging schema in KV task metadata.

## Schema Design

### Activity Entry
```typescript
interface Activity {
  id: string;
  type: ActivityType;
  message: string;
  actor?: string; // agent name or user
  timestamp: string;
  metadata?: Record<string, any>;
}

type ActivityType = 
  | 'created'      // Task created
  | 'assigned'      // Agent assigned
  | 'status_changed' // Status changed
  | 'priority_changed' // Priority changed
  | 'comment'       // Comment added
  | 'file_created'  // File deliverable added
  | 'completed'     // Task completed/shipped
  | 'deleted';      // Task soft-deleted
```

### Task Metadata Extension
```typescript
interface TaskWithActivities extends Task {
  activities: Activity[];
  activityCount: number;
  lastActivity?: string;
}
```

## Implementation

### 1. KV Storage
- Store activities array in task.metadata.activities
- Update task.activities on every status change
- Limit to last 100 activities per task (prevent bloat)

### 2. API Updates
- PATCH /api/tracker/tasks/[id] - auto-log activity
- POST /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/activities - manual activity
- GET /api/tracker/tasks/[id]/activities - fetch history

### 3. Frontend Display
- TaskModal Activity tab shows timeline
- Group by day
- Show activity type icons
- Filter by type selector

## Success Criteria
- All task changes are logged
- Activity history visible in TaskModal
- Activities persist in KV
- Performance: <100ms to load last 50 activities
